## TinySynq.runQuery() method

Run an operation against the DB

**Signature:**

```typescript
runQuery<T = any>(params: QueryParams): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [QueryParams](./tinysynq-web.queryparams.md) | The SQL query and optionally any values |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;T&gt;

Array of records returned from the database
